affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
notes:
Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast.
Remnants grant flying vision for their duration.
The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.
cmb:
70/80/90/100
3.50
lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
name: storm_spirit_static_remnant

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.
cmb:
100/110/120/130
21/20/19/18
lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
name: storm_spirit_electric_vortex

desc: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
name: storm_spirit_overload

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The mana activation cost is 15+7% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 12+0.75% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
notes:
Instant cast abilities can be used while traveling.
This ability will destroy trees.
Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.
cmb: 15/15/15/15
name: storm_spirit_ball_lightning
